Run these slash commands in order. Do not do anything else.

1. `/beads-plan $ARGUMENTS`
2. `/deepen-plan`
3. `/beads-work`
4. `/beads-review`
5. `/resolve-todo-parallel`
6. `/test-browser`
7. `/feature-video`

Start with step 1 now.
